title: Director
description: Securerex provides KYC, KYS, AML and EDD services for clients who wish to gain a greater insights of their exposure to risks and threats. We can provide special security screening for corporate event companies via our EventScreen solution. We have full investigations capabilities, which allow us to serve clients in a verity of ways, discreetly and efficiently.

title: Close Protection Officer/ Door Supervisor/ Event Security
description: Having worked within the Events Department of G4S for some five years I have experienced a great deal of roles in many venues both in the UK and overseas. Close Protection: My duties in a Close Protection capacity have included working both independently and as part of a team for several well known sports and music personalities at many world famous venues. Asset Protection: In this capacity I have been responsible for some of the most recognised trophies in the world both in the UK and Europe. General Security: I have been involved in security for many shows and exhibitions all differing in nature. These duties have been within the UK, Europe and the Middle East. Stewarding (02 arena London): Required excellent customer service, Directing large crowds, Ensuring the safety of all users of the venue.

title: Verification Manager
description: At the DSEi show guests are required to pre register where possible and be verified before entering. My role in relation to this was to draft the processes and procedures that would be in place for verification , both prior to the event and onsite, and then to implement them. When contemplating the verification procedure it was important to ensure that I was complying with the Government conditions for trade licences for the exhibition. I liaised with all visitors to the show in order to ensure that verification had been carried out effectively. Visitors to the show included: Overseas embassies, Military Units both from the UK and overseas, Police units both from the UK and overseas Civil Service and Government personnel, Media. In carrying out each of these tasks I had also to bear in mind deadlines that were set by the head of security for show.
